bibdata.title: American National Standard Dictionary for Technologies of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC), Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP) and Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) (Dictionary of EMC/EMP/ESD Terms and Definitions)

American National Standard Dictionary for Technologies of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC), Electromagnetic Pulse (EMP) and Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) (Dictionary of EMC/EMP/ESD Terms and Definitions)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms associated with electromagnetic compatibility (EMC), electromagnetic pulse (EMP), and electrostatic discharge (ESD) are defined. Quantities, units, multiplying factors, symbols, and abbreviations are covered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
